section.title: Test Campaign Groups
section.p: Test campaign groups allow users to create and add their test campaigns to folders. It will then aggregate all the test case execution data for each test campaign added.
Users can add a test campaign to a group from the test campaign edit screen.
Select the folder below and the table will be populated with the relevant information.
On the menu bar click the "Add Group" button to add a new folder.
Admin users have full access to create/edit and delete folders.

section.title: Test Campaign Groups Statistics
section.p: This section displays the metrics of all test executions and display's each result under different display sections.
This section displays all the test executions per test case types on a bar chart i.e. functional, performance, stability etc.
The overall pass rate is calculated by adding all N/A, Pass and Pass with Exception statuses to the over all pass rate result and gauge chart.
This section will show all test execution status from a progress bar and its actual value. Once the group has been clicked these values will update accordingly.
